items.sentence: Tom and Mary have been friends since primary school.
Tom and Mary are planning to get married in October.
You seemed to be having fun at the party last night.
I don't believe that Tom could've said such a thing.
Tom said he thought that he had forgotten something.
Tom spent several hours shoveling snow off the roof.
I used to go swimming in the sea when I was a child.
If you had a million yen, what would you do with it?
Tom said that he didn't want to sleep in the garage.
Tom's main problem is that he has no sense of humor.
